entry.string: Administration - xarCPShop
What is it?
xarCPShop integrates one or more Cafe Press Shops into your Xaraya site.
entry.translation: xarCPShop integra una o más <a href="http://www.cafepress.com">Tiendas Cafe Press en tu sitio Xaraya.

entry.string: It is based on code from a similar module for Postnuke by Ed Grosvener at http://www.thecpschool.com, rewritten and updated to work with current Cafe Press Site and Xaraya. The module enables you to:
entry.translation: Esta basado sobre un codigo desde un modulo similar para Postnuke por Ed Grosvener en http://www.thecpschool.com, reescrito y actualizado para trabajar con el actual sitio de Caffe Press y Xaraya. El modulo te permite:

entry.string: Add one or more Cafe Press Shops .
entry.translation: Agrega uno o más Tiendas Cafe Press.

entry.string: Grab the product pages from your Cafe Press Shops and displays them within Xaraya.
entry.translation: Tome las paginas del producto desde su Tienda Cafe Press y muestrelas dentro de Xaraya.

entry.string: Have your users browse your products and product details while remaining on your Xaraya site.
How to use it?

This module is still in early develoment but the basics are quite functional. The module does a simple integration of your Cafe Press Shop by capturing the Cafe Press URL and presenting that information in a page on your Xaraya site. To use the module:
entry.translation: Este modulo sigue estando en una temprana etapa de desarrollo pero lo básico esta bastante funcional. El modulo realiza una simple integración de su Tienda Cafe Shop mediante la captura de la URL Cafe Press y presentando esa información en una pagina sobre su Sitio Xaraya. Para usar el modulo:

entry.string: Install and activate in the usual way through the module List View page
entry.translation: Instale y active de modo usual a través de la pagina Vista lista de modulo

entry.string: In xarCPShop Administration, click on Add Shop
Add a description for your shop, the actual Cafe Press Shop ID, and the top level of the shop if it is part of a Premium Shop. This latter field can be left blank
Set any additional configuration variables in the Modify Config screen.
Included Blocks
Featured Product Block - Choose a single product from a specified store to feature. It is also best to cache this block which prevents errors should the Cafe Press web site be down.
Random Product Block - Choose to display X number of products from a selected store in a random display block on your page.
Included Hooks
No hooks are included
Further Information
Further information on the xarCPShop module can be found at
xarCPShop Extension page at
xarCPShop Module - Xaraya Extension 199
Click on Version History tab at the bottom to get the latest release information.
